name: Stalker in black
description:
With ugly desires and the stench of malice, lurking in the dark streets of the late night waiting for prey.
Careful of the surroundings and clutter on the ground, creeping up on the target, looking for an opportunity.
Or strike viciously and subdue the target with violence.
After capturing the target and put it in your own lair with a variety of props and postures, seduction or torture, so that the prey finally succumbed to the body and mind to give.
Then start the next round of hunting ......
This game is entirely fantasy game, please do not imitate in reality.
Collect information
You need to follow the hints and complete the objectives to get information about your prey.
Careful hunting
Use the various props around you to attract the attention of the obstructors. Get the opportunity to move forward. Be sure to be careful of the prey may also hurt the hunter.
Enjoy the results
After the successful capture, you can enjoy the prey in the way you like.
